title: General Eligibility Criteria
description: Basic requirements for various postgraduate programs

programs.name: Master of Arts (MA)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in relevant arts, humanities or social sciences

programs.name: Master of Science (MSc)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in Science, Technology, or related fields

programs.name: Master of Commerce (MCom)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in Commerce or related field

programs.name: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any discipline with valid management entrance exam (CAT, XAT, etc.)

programs.name: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree with Mathematics/Statistics as compulsory subject

programs.name: Master of Technology (MTech)
eligibility: BTech/BE or equivalent engineering degree

programs.name: Master of Social Work (MSW)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any stream

programs.name: Master of Education (MEd)
eligibility: BEd degree

programs.name: Master of Public Health (MPH)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in Medicine, Science or relevant allied fields

programs.name: Master of Fine Arts (MFA)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in Fine Arts or equivalent

programs.name: Master of Law (LLM)
eligibility: LLB degree

programs.name: Master of Pharmacy (MPharm)
eligibility: Bachelor of Pharmacy (BPharm)

programs.name: Master of Hospital Administration (MHA)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any field, preferably healthcare-related

programs.name: Master of Journalism and Mass Communication (MJMC)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any discipline

programs.name: Master of Environmental Science
eligibility: Bachelor's in Science or related field

programs.name: Master of Architecture (MArch)
eligibility: Bachelor's in Architecture

programs.name: Master of Design (MDes)
eligibility: Bachelor's in Design or related discipline

programs.name: Master of Library Science (MLIS)
eligibility: Bachelor's in any discipline

programs.name: Master of Urban Planning
eligibility: Bachelor's in Architecture, Planning, or Engineering

programs.name: Master of Tourism Administration
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any field

programs.name: Master of International Relations
eligibility: Bachelor's in Social Sciences/Humanities

programs.name: Master of Biotechnology
eligibility: Bachelor's in Science or Biotechnology

programs.name: Master of Statistics
eligibility: Bachelor's in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field

programs.name: Master of Economics
eligibility: Bachelor's in Economics or related field

programs.name: Master of Psychology
eligibility: Bachelor's in Psychology or related discipline

programs.name: Master of Physical Education (MPEd)
eligibility: Bachelor's in Physical Education

programs.name: Master of Agriculture
eligibility: Bachelor's in Agriculture or related fields

programs.name: Master of Rural Development
eligibility: Bachelor's in Social Sciences/Agriculture

programs.name: Master of Microbiology
eligibility: Bachelor's in Microbiology or related Science discipline

programs.name: Master of Geology
eligibility: Bachelor's in Geology or Earth Sciences

programs.name: Master of Anthropology
eligibility: Bachelor's in Anthropology or Social Sciences

programs.name: Master of Statistics and Informatics
eligibility: Bachelor's in Statistics, Mathematics, or Computer Science

programs.name: Master of Naval Architecture
eligibility: Bachelor's in Naval Architecture or Engineering

programs.name: Master of Forensic Science
eligibility: Bachelor's in Science or Forensic Science

programs.name: Master of Food Technology
eligibility: Bachelor's in Food Science or related field

programs.name: Master of Clinical Psychology
eligibility: Bachelor's in Psychology or related field

programs.name: Master of Social Work (Medical & Psychiatric)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in Social Work or allied health

programs.name: Master of Urban and Regional Planning
eligibility: Bachelor's in Planning, Architecture, Design, Engineering

programs.name: Master of Energy Management
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Science

programs.name: Master of Nanotechnology
eligibility: Bachelor's in Science or Engineering

programs.name: Master of Petroleum Engineering
eligibility: Bachelor's in Petroleum Engineering or related branch

programs.name: Master of Executive MBA (EMBA)
eligibility: Bachelor's degree with work experience

programs.name: Master of Public Policy and Administration
eligibility: Bachelor's degree

programs.name: Master of Event Management
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any discipline

programs.name: Master of Defense Studies
eligibility: Bachelor's degree with preference for Armed Forces personnel

programs.name: Master of Linguistics
eligibility: Bachelor's in Linguistics or related field

programs.name: Master of Cognitive Science
eligibility: Bachelor's degree in Cognitive Science, Psychology, Neuroscience
